title: cant play my champion
body: Hi, I just purchased Orianna with IP and then went straight to teambuilder to try her out, unfortunaely she isn't appearing in the list of champions i can select to play and I tried logging out then back in and still doesnt work. How do i fix this?

replies.body: Looks like you've played a game with her since this post, so I assume it was sorted out. :D
Yes, that was normal draft pick but both work now anyway :)
